com.facebook.buck.android

Interface FilteredResourcesProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    IdentityResourcesProvider, ResourcesFilter

    public interface FilteredResourcesProvider

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ImmutableSet<Path> getNonEnglishStringFiles() 
      ImmutableList<Path> getResDirectories() 
      boolean isStoreStringsAsAssets() 

    • Method Detail

      • getResDirectories

        ImmutableList<Path> getResDirectories()
        Returns:
        The set of res/ directories that should be used to calculate the final R.java file.

      • getNonEnglishStringFiles

        ImmutableSet<Path> getNonEnglishStringFiles()
        Returns:
        The set of non-english strings.xml files identified by the resource filter. Only used if isStoreStringsAsAssets() returns true.

      • isStoreStringsAsAssets

        boolean isStoreStringsAsAssets()
        Returns:
        Whether non-english strings need to be stored as assets. TODO(natthu): Remove this method from the interface once string assets are created in a new buildable.
